mapper.select: SELECT a.asset_id, ag.asset_group_nm, a.asset_group_id, a.user_id, a.asset_nm, a.amount, a.memo, a.show_yn, a.asset_seq, a.created_at, a.updated_at, CASE WHEN a.asset_group_id = 3 THEN ( SELECT IFNULL(-SUM(t.amount), 0) FROM tb_txn t WHERE t.asset_id = a.asset_id AND DATE_FORMAT(t.txn_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') ) ELSE 0 END AS prevAmount FROM tb_asset a JOIN tb_asset_group ag ON a.asset_group_id = ag.asset_group_id;
